A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a fantastic middle chapter to the trilogy\, showing fallible characters who are forced to learn from their mistakes. Character development was given both to the protagonists and to the villain\, while other characters were allowed to serve their purpose and then fade into the background. I am only sad that after the build-up of Leia's character in this film\, we will be unable to see that paid off in the final film of the trilogy.
